name: In the Matter of Howard Neil SHIPLEY.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of Howard Neil SHIPLEY.

opinions.text: A response having been filed, the Order to Show Cause dated December 8, 2014, is discharged. All Members of the Bar are reminded, however, that they are responsible-as Officers of the Court-for compliance with the requirement of Supreme Court Rule 14.3 that petitions for writs of certiorari be stated "in plain terms," and may not delegate that responsibility to the client.

casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of Howard Neil SHIPLEY.
No. D-2827.
Supreme Court of the United States
March 23, 2015.
Opinion
